items: Design and development of responsive web applications using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+)
Implementation of RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.js, integration of MongoDB and PostgreSQL databases
Development of dynamic user interfaces with React.js (hooks, context API, Redux Toolkit)
Implementation of authentication and authorization strategies (JWT, OAuth 2.0)
Use of Git for version control and collaboration via GitFlow
Deployment of applications on cloud platforms (AWS, Heroku) with Docker containerization
Front-end performance optimization (lazy loading, code splitting, caching strategies)
Unit and integration testing with Jest, React Testing Library, and Supertest
Syntactic and morphological analysis of contemporary English linguistic corpora
Comparative study of generative phonological theories and optimality theory
Sociolinguistic research on dialectal variation in digital media
Qualitative research methodology: semi-structured interviews and discourse analysis
